attributes.action: not nominate Tony Blair as the UK candidate for the position of president of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The character of Tony Blair would not suite such an important role. He has lied to the British public on numerous issues. His deep belief in religion seemed to cloud his judgement over foreign policy, especially in his dealings with George Bush and the Iraq war. Do we as a country really want to be responsible for inflicting this man on the rest of Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
